solution_line_template: Since Freyja is ten years old, Eli is {freyja_age}+{eli_older_than_freyja} = <<{freyja_age}+{eli_older_than_freyja}={eli_age}>>{eli_age} years old.
Sarah's age is twice Eli's, then Sarah is {sarah_times_eli}*{eli_age}= <<{sarah_times_eli}*{eli_age}={sarah_age}>>{sarah_age} years old.
Kaylin is five years younger than Sarah, then she is {sarah_age}-{kaylin_younger_than_sarah} = <<{sarah_age}-{kaylin_younger_than_sarah}={kaylin_age}>>{kaylin_age} years old.
